inputs: I loved the cinematography but thought the plot was weak.
The ending was a bit rushed but overall enjoyable.
The pacing dragged in the middle, but the visuals and lighting were stunning.
I connected deeply with the storyline — it felt personal and real.
Some of the dialogue felt forced, but the action scenes made up for it.
Brilliant performance by the lead actress. Her emotions felt so raw and authentic.
I didn’t fully understand the plot, but the music gave me chills.
A fun, light-hearted film that left me smiling all the way through the credits.
Too many subplots made it confusing at times, though the ending tied things together nicely.
